Lyric:
[00:10.20]The club isn't the best place to find a lover
[00:12.62]So the bar is where I go
[00:15.64]Me and my friends at the table doing shots
[00:18.03]Drinking fast and then we talk slow
[00:20.69]And you come over and start up a conversation with just me
[00:23.35]And trust me I'll give it a chance now
[00:25.59]Take my hand, stop, put Van the Man on the jukebox
[00:28.90]And then we start to dance, and now I'm singing like
[00:31.70]
[00:31.90]Girl, you know I want your love
[00:34.21]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[00:37.16]Come on now, follow my lead
[00:39.48]I may be crazy, don't mind me
[00:42.00]Say, boy, let's not talk too much

[00:47.67]Come on now, follow my lead

[00:53.73]
